title: So, Ryze. How the fuck do you fight him?
body: Builds full tank, but can out-duel the 15/3 Trist carry who can massively shit on the rest of his team, but I can't go anywhere near him or I instantly die. How in the fuck is it balanced for him to do that much damage while building no damage and having targeted CC / nuke spam?

replies.body: Except that Ryze doesn't really build AP so much as magic pen and mana (and his damage scales off of his mana.)
He still does magic damage with it...

He is basically busted if the player is skilled enough to play him correctly. Riot knows this and he is getting reworked again. In the meantime I suggest banning him. Otherwise stay back and only go near when his stuff is down or preferably when he gets cc'd. 

But like I said Riot is changing him...I'll be surprised if it works given Ryze's history but they are trying anyway.

What SrbLud said, and you do not need to fight anyone alone as an ADC.  I HATE ADC's that want to go solo and get Splatted.  Everyone _can_ kill you as a squishy ADC.  Its your job to out play and stay with team mates that can peel for you.

Edit:  Also, Generally speaking ADC > Tanks > APC > ADC.  So its kinda Ryze's Job to be able to kill you.
Whoever said I was alone? I went in on teamfights, and Ryze would literally carry the fight and kill everyone. I could kill his entire team within a couple seconds, but then he just 4v1s and wins.
In that case, you need to pick your kill order better.  Ryze sounds like a more High Priority target in that case.  Idk, you are better then me.
